issue.title: [CI] Upgrade to latest setup-python action
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16955](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16955). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are inconsistently using old versions (v1, v2 and v3) for setup-python. This ticket aim is to upgrade them all to the latest v4.
